title: 01 The Barron Report
description: Welcome to episode 1 of The Barron Report, your go-to podcast for high-level insights into the restaurant and hospitality industry. Our well-seasoned host, Paul Barron, has 25 years of industry experience. He’s predicted major trends and coined the term "fast-casual." On this podcast, Paul connects with other industry leaders to discuss the restaurant and hospitality business, predict trends, and read between the lines to get a clearer view of the industry.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
